mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT bNo, title, content, writer, regidate, viewCnt, replyCnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY bNo DESC, regidate DESC) AS rnum FROM nBoard )numbered WHERE numbered.rnum BETWEEN #{pageStart} +1 AND (#{pageStart} + #{perPageNum}) ORDER BY numbered.rnum

SELECT * FROM ( select bNo, title, content, writer, regidate, viewCnt , replyCnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY bNo DESC, regidate DESC) AS rnum from nBoard where bNo > 0 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pageStart} AND (#{pageStart} + #{perPageNum} - 1) order by bNo desc, regidate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT * FROM nBoard
ORDER BY regidate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nBoard WHERE bNo > 0
SELECT COUNT(bNo) FROM nBoard WHERE bNo > 0

where.if: AND (title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR writer LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')

mapper.insert: insert into nBoard (writer, title, content, viewCnt, replyCnt) values(#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCnt}, #{replyCnt})
